com.io7m.r2.core

Class R2LightSphericalSingle

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.io7m.r2.core.R2LightSphericalSingle
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    R2LightReadableType, R2LightSingleReadableType, R2LightSingleType, R2LightSingleWritableType, R2LightSphericalReadableType, R2LightSphericalSingleReadableType, R2LightSphericalSingleType, R2LightSphericalSingleWritableType, R2LightSphericalWritableType, R2LightVolumeSingleReadableType, R2LightVolumeSingleType, R2LightVolumeSingleWritableType, R2LightWritableType

    public final class R2LightSphericalSingle
extends Object
implements R2LightSphericalSingleType
    Parameters for simple spherical lights that operate by rendering scaled unit spheres.

      • setGeometryScaleFactor

        public void setGeometryScaleFactor(double f)
        Description copied from interface: R2LightSphericalSingleWritableType
        Set the geometry scale factor. The final rendered scale of the light volume geometry is given by R2LightSphericalReadableType.radius() * f. This is used to artificially enlarge the light volume to account for, for example, the fact that a low-polygon approximation of a sphere will typically have a smaller volume than a real sphere would.
        Specified by:
        setGeometryScaleFactor in interface R2LightSphericalSingleWritableType
        Parameters:
        f - The scale factor
